description: Rick Waldrip My mom  Elaine Huff  is in the hospital. She has CPOD and emphysema, and has been on oxygen for several years.  Her oxygen level dropped dangerously and it affected her heart.  Paula  and I had just arrived in Denver and yesterday we were getting ready to celebrate  Jason 's birthday when my brother Rob called and told me about Mom and that he was taking her to the ER. With Mom's condition, we knew it was serious so we had to cut our vacation plans short.  We drove all night to get back home this morning. Mom is in critical care at Mayo. She is doing a little better today but still many unknowns. She's the strongest woman I have ever known and she will pull through. Please keep her in your thoughts and prayers. Thanks all. Rick Waldrip
